Title: The Garden Pantry
Plot: The Garden Pantry is a unique series that teaches a new generation the almost lost art of being self sustainable from their own backyard.  From growing and harvesting home-grown fruit and vegetables, to cooking, preserving and freezing their produce for the winter, this generation has an incredible desire and passion to get back to the basics of healthy eating and the "good life" inherent in growing and processing your own food.
